item.title: 「ETH Whale with 75% Win Rate in Four Battles」 on the Verge of Liquidation, Ethereum Short Position Faces Over $9 Million in Unrealized Losses
item.description: On August 8th, as indicated by on-chain data, the "Four-Battle ETH 75% Win Rate Whale" is on the verge of liquidation (with a liquidation price of $4,016.41). Its 15x short position in Ethereum is facing a floating loss of more than $9 million.

item.title: Affected by ETH Breaking $4,000, Stock BMNR Surges Over 14% Intraday
item.description: On August 8th, according to the market data from Rockflow, due to ETH breaking through $4000, the stock BMNR witnessed an intraday surge of over 14% and is currently trading at $47.26.

item.title: AguilaTrades's long positions for BTC and ETH are currently showing a combined unrealized profit of $5.11 million.
item.description: On August 8th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the total unrealized profit of AguilaTrades' long positions in BTC and ETH is $5.11 million, with ETH accounting for $3.93 million of the profit.BTC: Long with a multiple of 40 and holding 1277.75 coins, with an entry price of $115,968.ETH: Long with a multiple of 25 and holding 20,296.06 coins, with an entry price of $3,783.1.

item.title: Ethereum Breaks $4000 Barrier Again After 237 Days, Reaches New High for the Year
item.description: August 8th. According to HTX market data, Ethereum has once again surpassed the $4000 mark after 237 days since December 14th, 2024, reaching a new high for the year.

item.title: Ethereum Records 2.42% Price Increase in the Past Hour, Nearing the $4000 Milestone
item.description: On August 8th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum witnessed a nearly 2.42% hourly increase and approached $4,000. It is currently trading at $3,979.15.

item.title: Linea Network TVL Surges Over 37% in the Last 24 Hours, Now Standing at $260 Million
item.description: On August 8th, based on DefiLlama data, the TVL of the Linea Network has witnessed a surge of over 37% in the past 24 hours and currently stands at $2.6082 billion.Yesterday, the DEX protocol Etherex, which completed its TGE, became the protocol with the largest TVL on the Linea Network. Its current TVL is $96.13 million, representing a weekly increase of 1241%.

item.title: Bitcoin ETF Daily Net Inflow: 2,195 BTC, Ethereum ETF Net Inflow: 43,329 ETH
item.description: On August 8th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, 10 Bitcoin ETFs witnessed a net inflow of 2,195 BTC (approximately $256 million) within a single day. Among them, iShares (BlackRock) received 1,191 BTC (approximately $139 million) and currently holds 739,362 BTC (approximately $86.23 billion).In addition, 9 Ethereum ETFs saw a net inflow of 43,329 ETH (approximately $169 million) in a single day. iShares (BlackRock) received 26,604 ETH (approximately $104 million) and currently holds 2,987,576 ETH (approximately $11.67 billion).

item.title: U.S. Stock Crypto Sector Starts Trading Day with Broad Gains, BMNR Up Over 5%
item.description: On August 8th, according to the market data from Rockflow, the US stock cryptocurrency sector opened with a general upward trend. This includes:ETH MicroStrategy Stocks: BMNR rose by more than 5%, and SBET increased by 2.18%;BNB MicroStrategy Stocks: BNC went up by 5.03%, while WINT dropped by 2.18%;COIN rose by 0.18% and CRCL rose by 1.27%.

item.title: Source: Joe McCann-led Solana Treasury Company has called off SPAC deal
item.description: On August 8th, it was reported by sources that the Solana financial tool SPAC deal led by Joe McCann has been called off. The reason for the failed transaction has not been made public immediately. Two weeks ago, a limited partner at McCann's hedge fund Asymmetric posted on X that the fund has witnessed a nearly 80% decline year-to-date.On July 24th, it was announced that Joe McCann, the founder and CEO of the crypto hedge fund Asymmetric Financial, is going to serve as the CEO of a new Solana treasury company called Accelerate. The company plans to raise up to $1.51 billion. It intends to raise $800 million through a PIPE, $358.8 million through a SPAC, $250 million through convertible bonds, and sell $103.2 million in SPAC subscription rights. If this fundraising is successful, Accelerate will promptly start to establish a new Solana treasury or become the largest SOL treasury management company in the market.

item.title: NASDAQ-listed company Trident Digital plans to raise $500 million to establish a corporate XRP reserve
item.description: On August 8th, the Nasdaq-listed company Trident Digital Tech Holdings (TDTH) announced today that it has the intention to apply for a stablecoin operational license in multiple African countries with the aim of promoting the application of RLUSD in the African market. Additionally, the company plans to raise $5 billion in order to establish a corporate XRP reserve pool so as to enhance the integration with the Ripple ecosystem.The company is currently in the early stages of discussions with regulatory agencies and financial institutions in different countries and is anticipated to commence the phased deployment in pilot countries by the middle of 2026.
